message.body: I'm sure you're hearing this from everyone, but please stay safe my sweet small one!! I love you!!
Thank you! I am so scared and alone
The whole city is in lock down
My darling!! I wish I could come stay with you and pretend this wasn't happening...mani/pedis, magic mike, no news channels allowed, a couple snuggies...
It kills me knowing you are there and have to go through this.
I'm shaking this is so scary
I'm calling you in like 10 once I'm out of the garage
Haha okay I'm on the phone with my aunt
Okay well take your time with her! I won't be offendes if you don't pick up haha and I'll know not to worry ;-)
Hi sorry!!!! Family has been calling me nonstop! But thank you so much for the call and voicemail! Love you! Will update you as soon as thy come through!
No worries at all!! Love youuu!!
